text: Mamou is a region in the center of Guinea. It is bordered by the country of Sierra Leone and the Guinean regions of Faranah, Lab√©, and Kindia. The regional capital is the city of Mamou. As of the 2014 census, 732,117 people lived there. It has an area of . == Prefectures == * Dalaba Prefecture * Mamou Prefecture * Pita Prefecture Category:Regions of Guinea
title: Mamou Region
